services.title: Wedding Photography

testimonials.name: Sarah & Michael
testimonials.text: FocusFrame captured our wedding day perfectly! The photos are absolutely stunning and bring back all the emotions of that special day.

testimonials.name: The Johnson Family
testimonials.text: The family portrait session was so much fun! The photographer made us all feel comfortable and the results were beautiful.

testimonials.name: TechSolutions Inc.
testimonials.text: Professional, creative, and delivered exactly what we wanted for our corporate event. Highly recommended!
